0110001000100001 1010011000010001 1 -> sum: 0000100000110011, cout: 1

0111011010111011 0110110001100011 0 -> sum: 1110001100011110, cout: 0
0001111100110001 0011111010110111 0 -> sum: 0101110111101000, cout: 0
1011000011111111 0011010000000000 1 -> sum: 1110010100000000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
